      • getCenter

        public LatLon getCenter()
        Returns the center of this entity. For nodes it's the exact position. For ways their geometric center is used. For relations the center of a bounding box defined by the centers of all member entities is used.
        Specified by:
        getCenter in class Entity
        Returns:
        The center of this entity or null if there is no data

      • getBounds

        public Bounds getBounds()
        Returns a bounding box that contains all elements and sub-entities of this entity.
        Specified by:
        getBounds in class Entity
        Returns:
        The surrounding bounding box

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Whether the way is closed. A closed way means its first and last nodes are identical.
        Returns:
        True if the way is closed
